FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: Joel has money is a personal loan company that offers financial solutions to its customers.

FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_1_DESCRIPTION: Click the “Request a Loan” button and input the personal information of the project you are looking to fund.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_2_DESCRIPTION: Please ensure the information is  accurate and in line with the listed.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_3_DESCRIPTION: Our team will respond to clients who request a loan through email within 24 hours.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_4_DESCRIPTION: If your deal is eligible for financing, you will receive an automated email from noreply@joelhasmoney.com informing that an offer is ready for your review.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_5_DESCRIPTION: After the loan Offer is accepted and the necessary information and documents we will order a valuation and move the file into underwriting.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_6_DESCRIPTION: Our fulfillment team will order title and insurance, and reach out to you for any additional info we will need for closing.

CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Joel has money is funding Smart Real Estate Moves. If your deal makes sense, the money’s ready.
TESTIMONIALS_DESCRIPTION: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our customers have to say about their experience with our platform.

TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION_1: Excellent service and speed in delivering the loan.
TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION_2: Very good service and excellent customer service.
TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION_3: Very good service and excellent customer service.

OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_1: Full Project Financing: Get 100% of the purchase price and rehab costs covered — up to 80% of the ARV. You only cover closing costs.
OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_2: Fast Approvals: Receive your funds in just 48 to 72 hours.
OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_3: No Credit Check Needed: Your credit score won’t impact your approval.
OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_4: No Income Docs Required: Skip the paperwork — no income verification necessary.

OPTION_2_LIST.OPTION_2_1: Maximize Your Equity: Pull out up to 85% of your property’s value.
OPTION_2_LIST.OPTION_2_2: Minimum Credit Score: A FICO of 640 or higher is needed.
OPTION_2_LIST.OPTION_2_3: Smooth Closings: Typically closed within 3 to 4 weeks.
OPTION_2_LIST.OPTION_2_4: No Income Docs Required: Income verification isn’t part of the process.
OPTION_2_LIST.OPTION_2_5: Flexible Payment Options: Interest-only loans available in 5, 7, or 10-year terms.

FOOTER_DESCRIPTION: We fund flips, rentals, and creative deals with real, asset-backed capital—no banks, no delays. If your numbers work, the funds move. Fast decisions. Straightforward solutions. Closed.
